definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to hand over/to pass on sth/to gradually increase or decrease/progressively
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Additionally, the defendant may file a counter - claim (or cross- claim) to assert the defendant's own claims against the plaintiff.
sentences.chinese: 另外，被告可以遞交反訴狀來向原告主張自己的權利。

sentences.english: The new government will then deliver its policy statement before parliament.
sentences.chinese: 然後，新政府將在國會之前遞交其政策聲明。

sentences.english: The Chinese side also presented an official note on the matter to the U.S. side.
sentences.chinese: 中方還就此向美方遞交了正式照會。

sentences.english: Use rollovers to submit or reset a form.
sentences.chinese: 使用翻身遞交或者重新設置一張表格。

sentences.english: Case write-ups are to be submitted to the T. A. before the class when they are due.
sentences.chinese: 案例文章應在截止日上課之前遞交助教。

sentences.english: Then Mr Brown departed on the short ride to Buckingham Palace, to tender his resignation.
sentences.chinese: 布朗隨後離開，經過一小段路後到白金漢宮遞交辭呈。

sentences.english: The students have submitted their essays to their tutors.
sentences.chinese: 學生把論文遞交給導師。

sentences.english: A phase-III Summary Report will be submitted for review and approval.
sentences.chinese: 遞交階段III概述報告，以審覈和批准。

sentences.english: Details of participants (name & HKID/travel document number) must be submitted at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 負責領袖必須於遞交參加者中英姓名及證件號碼。

sentences.english: Adjust the plan book then submit it to teacher in student affairs office.
sentences.chinese: 修改策劃書並遞交給學生事務辦公室負責老師。

sentences.english: Under the circumstances, I think you'll understand my decision to resign.
sentences.chinese: 在我向你遞交這份辭職報告之後，我即將離開公司了。

sentences.english: Application may be submitted bye-form and must be digitally signed.
sentences.chinese: 申請可以電子表格遞交，但須加上數碼簽署。

sentences.english: Applicants whose personal statements are submitted in both Korean and English receive precedent.
sentences.chinese: 曾有申請學生遞交過韓英雙語之自薦個人陳述的先例。

sentences.english: The suit was filed in Illinois' Circuit Court of Cook County.
sentences.chinese: 訴訟是向庫克縣伊利諾斯巡迴法院遞交的。

sentences.english: Submit assessment report or certification for propriety made fire damper installation method.
sentences.chinese: 遞交評定報告或證書關於專利廠防火閘的安裝方法。

sentences.english: Have you paid the review fee together with the completed application form?
sentences.chinese: 閣下有否把已填妥之申請表連同覆檢費用一併遞交？

definition: to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
